title: With AI, MIT researchers teach a robot to build furniture by just asking
description:
A team of MIT researchers created a speech-to-reality system that enables a robot to build furniture with just a simple request.

The post With AI, MIT researchers teach a robot to build furniture by just asking appeared first on The Robot Report.
